name: aiblocks
description: AI Blocks - JavaScript with TypeScript-level safety

scripts.typecheck: tsc $(find src -name '*.js' ! -name '*.test.js') --noEmit --checkJs --strict --target ES2024 --module NodeNext --moduleResolution NodeNext --skipLibCheck --types node
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run format:check

author: lpm
